scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.copy: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-styles && npm run copy-app-assets
scripts.copy-assets: shx --verbose cp -R src/assets/. dist/assets/ || echo 'no file copied'
scripts.copy-styles: shx --verbose cp -R src/scss/. dist/scss/ || echo 'no file copied'
scripts.copy-app-assets: (shx --verbose cp src/*.txt dist/ || echo 'no file copied') && (shx --verbose cp src/*.html dist/ || echo 'no file copied') && (shx --verbose cp src/*.ejs dist/ || echo 'no file copied')
scripts.dist: mkdir lib && cd dist && tar cvzf ../lib/<%-name.toLowerCase()%>.tar.gz *
